title: Nizam al-Din al-Nisaburi
summary: Nizam al-Din Hasan al-Nisaburi, whose full name was Nizam al-Din Hasan ibn Mohammad ibn Hossein Qumi Nishapuri (d. 1328/29) (Persian: نظام الدین حسن نیشاپوری) was a Persian Sunni[1][2][3] Islamic Shafi'i, Ash'ari scholar, mathematician, astronomer, jurist, Qur'an exegete, and poet.
